2023 is wrapping up, and it was definitely the year of Artificial Intelligence. 🤖

Here are my favorite AI projects this year (in random order)

👇

— MatthewBerman (@MatthewBerman) December 26, 2023

Adapters a new open-source library for transfer learning in LLMs.

Features:

▪️ Unifies 10 adapter methods in one interface
▪️ Facilitates easy use and flexible configurations
▪️ Enables complex adapter setups through composition blocks

Links 👇🏼 pic.twitter.com/W2ZQ9evJ4Y

— TuringPost (@TheTuringPost) December 1, 2023

🎉 Exciting news! The new Adapters library for modular and parameter-efficient transfer learning is out! 🤖

Now simplified & disentangled from @huggingface

pip install adapters
pip install transformers
